remarks: An idiom to express that a lattice element differs from two others. (Contributed by NM, 19-Jul-2012.)
statement:
latlej.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latlej.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
latlej.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
latnlej1l $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) /\ -. X .<_ ( Y .\/ Z ) ) -> X =/= Y ) $.
